General.Name: Lumina Gold Corp
General.Description: Lumina Gold Corp., a precious and base metals exploration and development company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral resources in Ecuador. The company primarily explores for gold and copper deposits. It focuses on the Cangrejos Gold-Copper Project located in El Oro Province, southwest Ecuador. The company was formerly known as Odin Mining and Exploration Ltd. and changed its name to Lumina Gold Corp. in November 2016. Lumina Gold Corp. was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 625 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T6
